p: MPV is an enveloped virus and thus inactivated by soap, disinfectants, or alcohols. Spread is thought to occur by direct or close contact with contaminated secretions. Infectious virus can persist at room temperature, especially nonporous surfaces, for up to 8 h [ 183]. Contact precautions are recommended as for RSV with meticulous hand hygiene. Cohorting of patients and caregivers should be considered during outbreaks in care facilities.
